parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets construction camera parameters. To work with "camconstruct" object.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camConstuctionSetParams''' <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[x,y,z], radius, maxAboveLand]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[x,y,z], radius, maxAboveLand]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> [x,y,z]: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> maxAboveLand: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camConstuctionSetParams]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] [[player]], 50, 20];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camCreate]], [[cameraEffect]]
</value></part></template>
